unnormalised: **EV Charging Heats Up, Just in Time for Onam Road Trips!**
normalised: E V Charging Heats Up, Just in Time for Onam Road Trips!

unnormalised: Bangalore: Forget range anxiety, folks! EV charging infrastructure is finally getting some juice, just in time for all those Onam road trips back to Kerala. Ather Energy announced plans to install 500 new fast chargers across South India by the end of the year. Imagine reaching Kochi without breaking a sweat (or a prayer).
normalised: Bangalore: Forget range anxiety, folks! E V charging infrastructure is finally getting some juice, just in time for all those Onam road trips back to Kerala. Ather Energy announced plans to install five hundred new fast chargers across South India by the end of the year. Imagine reaching Kochi without breaking a sweat (or a prayer).

unnormalised: Meanwhile, Tata Power is partnering with multiple state transport corporations, including KSRTC, to electrify bus depots. Think cleaner air and quieter journeys – less honking, more listening to your favorite Malayalam songs!
normalised: Meanwhile, Tata Power is partnering with multiple state transport corporations, including K S R T C, to electrify bus depots. Think cleaner air and quieter journeys – less honking, more listening to your favorite Malayalam songs!

unnormalised: Even our own IIT-Madras is getting in on the action, developing new battery tech that could significantly reduce charging times. Soon, you'll be able to grab a quick biryani and fully charge your EV before the first grain of rice hits your plate!
normalised: Even our own I I T-Madras is getting in on the action, developing new battery tech that could significantly reduce charging times. Soon, you will be able to grab a quick biryani and fully charge your E V before the first grain of rice hits your plate!

unnormalised: Reports suggest Reliance is also planning a major charging network push, meaning more options and competitive pricing for all you EV enthusiasts. Buckle up; the future is electric, and it's charging up faster than ever.
normalised: Reports suggest Reliance is also planning a major charging network push, meaning more options and competitive pricing for all you E V enthusiasts. Buckle up; the future is electric, and it is charging up faster than ever.
